docreader.range.table

Class TableDimensionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • docreader.range.table.TableDimensionsManager

  • final class TableDimensionsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages dimensions (left/right offset values, ...) of all visible cells in a table
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TableDimensionsManager.CellData
      Immutable store for metadata of a table cell
      private static class  TableDimensionsManager.TableColspanManager
      Manage cells which span more than one column
      private static class  TableDimensionsManager.TableRowspanManager
      Manage cells which span more than one row

    • Field Detail

      • tableData

        private final transient HashMap2D<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer,TableDimensionsManager.CellData> tableData
        Hashmap to store cellData. First key is row, second is column. Not guaranteed to be rectangular or even continuous.

    • Method Detail

      • getCellData

        public TableDimensionsManager.CellData getCellData(int rowNum,
                                                   int columnNum)
        Parameters:
        rowNum - 0-based row number for which to get data
        columnNum - 0-based column number for which to get data
        Returns:
        cellData for the given cell or null if there is no such data

      • getLastColumnIndexForRow

        public java.lang.Integer getLastColumnIndexForRow(int rowNum)
        Parameters:
        rowNum - index of the row of interest (0-based)
        Returns:
        absolute index of the last column in this row (taking into account any possible merged cells) or null if the given rowNum was out of range

      • getIndexOfLastRow

        public int getIndexOfLastRow()
        Returns:
        absolute index of the last row in this table

        Calculate the row height
        Parameters:
        tableRow - row for which to calculate the height
        Returns:
        calculated row height in twips
